text:
<@U3KBYJQSF>, верно.
Коллеги попросили переопубликовать, но в _jobs стали интенсивно минусовать, хотя в правилах не указано, что повторная публикация через неделю запрещена.

text:
Добрый день!

Ищется специалист Machine Learning с желанием релоцироваться в Японию.
Компания: Mercari, a marketplace where people can buy and sell easily and safely, in Japan and the
United States.
Знание английского - обязательно, японского - опционально.
Вилка: минимум 50K USD  в год gross, максимум - 200K USD

*What you will be doing*
• Participate in cutting edge research in machine learning, NLP and/or computer vision applications,
• Develop innovative applications/PoC to make Mercari future proof,
• Cultivate and foster partnerships with universities and partners’ R&D departments.

*Requirements*
• PhD in Computer Science, related technical field or equivalent practical and research experience.
• Experience in Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Natural Language Understanding/Processing.
• Programming experience in C, C++, Python.
• Experience with ML frameworks such as Tensorflow, pytorch, etc.
• Experience publishing or presenting academic papers.

*Additional qualifications*
• Relevant work experience, including full time industry experience or as a researcher in a lab.
• Experience publishing or presenting academic papers at top tier conferences.
• Ability to design and execute on research agenda.
• Experience collaborating with designers, product managers, business analysts and 
• other developers as part of a highly cross-functional team.

*Contract Type*
One of the following types:
• Full-time * Probationary Period: 3 months (salary same as above)
• Contract * Negotiable during the contract period
• Outsourcing

*Location*: Roppongi/Tokyo
May be Hongo, Bunkyo-ku, Tokyo

BENEFITS: Health insurance, Incentive program, Employee stock ownership plan, Full transportation coverage, Custom PC (Dual screen if needed), Company smartphone, Visa support, New Employee Benefits at Mercari mercibox

Пишите здесь или на почту: <mailto:olga.writeme@gmail.com|olga.writeme@gmail.com>
